DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine difference drug exposure subject administer 50 mg tablet sertraline hydrochloride compare drug exposure administer 50 mg capsule sertraline hydrochloride fast ( nonfed ) condition .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Drug Exposure Humans After Administration 50 mg Tablet Sertraline Hydrochloride Compared 50 mg Capsule Sertraline Hydrochloride Under Fasted ( Nonfed ) Conditions
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 21 55 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 45 kg ( 99 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy )
